text: Shwe (Ꚗ ꚗ; italics: Ꚗ ꚗ) is a letter of the Cyrillic script. It looks like the letter Sha (Ш ш) with a long tail attached to its bottom. Shwe is used in an old alphabet of the Abkhaz language, where it represents the labialized voiceless postalveolar fricative (/ʃʷ/). It corresponds to Шә in the modern Abkhaz alphabet. Category:Cyrillic letters
title: Shwe (Cyrillic)
